subtitleNullable: Study on How Data Can Help Researchers to Understand Online Retailers

_____
# Nike Products: Prices, Descriptions, Reviews
### Study on How Data Can Help Researchers to Understand Online Retailers
By Crawl Feeds [[source]](https://data.world/opensnippets)
_____

### About this dataset
> Welcome to the Nike dataset! This dataset contains information on Nike USA products, including prices, descriptions, and customer reviews. With this dataset, you will be able to analyze Nike product costs, popularity, and customer satisfaction. You can use this data to help you make better decisions about which Nike products to buy or sell. Thanks for using the Nike dataset!

### More Datasets
> For more datasets, click [here](https://www.kaggle.com/thedevastator/datasets).

### Featured Notebooks
> - 🚨 **Your notebook can be here!** 🚨! 

### How to use the dataset
> If you are looking for information on Nike USA products, including prices, descriptions, and customer reviews, then this dataset is for you! This dataset contains a wealth of information that can be used to research Nike products, compare prices, and find the perfect product for your needs

### Research Ideas
> - Generate targeted marketing campaigns for Nike products based on customer reviews and ratings
> - Use product descriptions and customer reviews to improve the Nike e-commerce website
> - Analyze customer reviews to identify areas of improvement for Nike products

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> [Data Source](https://data.world/opensnippets)
> 
> 
> ### License
> 
> 
> **Unknown License - Please check the dataset description for more information.**

### Columns

**File: nike_data_2022_09.csv**
| Column name         | Description                                                   |
|:--------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------|
| **url**             | The URL of the product on Nike's website. (String)            |
| **name**            | The name of the product. (String)                             |
| **sub_title**       | A short description of the product. (String)                  |
| **brand**           | The brand of the product. (String)                            |
| **model**           | The model of the product. (String)                            |
| **color**           | The color of the product. (String)                            |
| **price**           | The price of the product. (Float)                             |
| **currency**        | The currency of the price. (String)                           |
| **availability**    | The availability of the product. (String)                     |
| **raw_description** | The raw HTML of the description. (String)                     |
| **avg_rating**      | The average customer rating of the product. (Float)           |
| **review_count**    | The number of customer reviews of the product. (Integer)      |
| **images**          | A list of URLs of images of the product. (List of strings)    |
| **available_sizes** | The sizes that the product is available in. (List of strings) |
| **scraped_at**      | The date and time that the product was scraped. (Datetime)    |

### Acknowledgements
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit the original authors.
> If you use this dataset in your research, please credit [Crawl Feeds](https://data.world/opensnippets).
